name: The Legend of Dragoon
summary:
Experience The Legend of Dragoon originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Unveil a fantasy of magnificence, deception, magical combat, and retribution as you join swordsman Dart and his companions to harness the spiritual forces of Dragons and triumph over evil.

Using a unique and innovative tactical combat system, transform into Dragoons and unleash extraordinary powers. Control a wide variety of characters that wield unique weapons and Dragoon attacks powered by the elements in this unforgettable role-playing game.
